snippet: Brazil will not fulfill its commitment to clean up Rio de Janeiro’s sewage-filled Guanabara Bay, where the Olympic sailing events are to be held, by the 2016 Olympics, state environmental officials acknowledged in a letter.
abstract: Brazil will not fulfill its commitment to clean up Rio de Janeiro’s sewage-filled Guanabara Bay, where the Olympic sailing events are to be held, by the 2016 Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Brazil will not fulfill its commitment to clean up Rio de Janeiro’s sewage-filled Guanabara Bay, where the Olympic sailing events are to be held, by the 2016 Olympics, state environmental officials acknowledged in a letter.

headline.main: No Cleanup for Bay in Rio de Janeiro
headline.print_headline: No Cleanup for Bay in Rio
